io.spine.server.entity

Class Repository<I,E extends Entity<I,?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.server.entity.Repository<I,E>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.spine.logging.Logging, Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AggregateRepository, RecordBasedRepository

    public abstract class Repository<I,E extends Entity<I,?>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Closeable, io.spine.logging.Logging
    Abstract base class for repositories.

      Creates the repository.

        Parameters:

      • find

        public abstract java.util.Optional<E> find(I id)
        Finds an entity with the passed ID.
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the entity to load
        Returns:
        the entity or Optional.empty() if there's no entity with such ID

      • iterator

        public java.util.Iterator<E> iterator(java.util.function.Predicate<E> filter)
        Returns an iterator over the entities managed by the repository that match the passed filter.

        The returned iterator does not support removal.

        Iteration through entities is performed by loading them one by one.

      • index

        public java.util.Iterator<I> index()
        Returns an iterator over the identifiers of all the entities managed by this repository.

      • storage

        protected final Storage<I,?> storage()
        Returns the storage assigned to this repository.

        To verify if the storage is assigned, use Repository.storageAssigned().

        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the storage is not assigned

      • storageAssigned

        public final boolean storageAssigned()
        Returns true if the storage is assigned, false otherwise.

      • checkStorage

        protected static <S extends java.lang.AutoCloseable> S checkStorage(S storage)
        Ensures that the storage is not null.
        Returns:
        passed value if it's not not null
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the passed instance is null

      • createStorage

        protected abstract Storage<I,?> createStorage()
        Creates the storage for this repository.

        Default implementations use Repository.defaultStorageFactory() invoking its method which creates a storage compatible with the repository.

        Overwrite this method for creating a custom implementation of Storage.

        Returns:
        the created storage instance

      • close

        @OverridingMethodsMustInvokeSuper
public void close()
        Closes the repository by closing the underlying storage.

        The reference to the storage becomes null after this call.

        Specified by:
        close in interface java.lang.AutoCloseable

      • isOpen

        public final boolean isOpen()
        Verifies if the repository is open.
        Specified by:
        isOpen in interface Closeable

      • eventFilter

        @SPI
 @Pure
public EventFilter eventFilter()
        Creates an EventFilter for this repository.

        All the events posted by this repository, domain, and system are first passed through this filter.

        By default, the filter allows all the events to be posted. For entities which do not allow state subscription, the EntityStateChanged event is filtered out. Override this method to change this behaviour.

        Returns:
        an EventFilter to apply to all posted events
        Implementation Note:
        This method may be called many times for a single repository. It is reasonable that it does not re-initialize the filter each time. Also, it is necessary that the filter returned from this method is always (at least effectively) the same. See @Pure for the details on the expected behaviour.
